column5: We often eat at a nice steak house that's part of a hotel located on the East shore of the lake coming into Dryden. Somewhat accross the lake from the paper mill. I'm have a mental lapse......anyone remember the name of the place??
You got it! Thought I was going to strip some gears trying to remember that. Thanks.

We do to! BTW, I notice on their web site that the owners want to retire and the place is for sale. Check it out with your wife.....she could manage it and you could fish. Plus you get to spend Christmas in Dryden!
